org.jcsp.awt
Interface ActiveTextArea.Configure

Enclosing class:
ActiveTextArea
public static interface ActiveTextArea.Configure

This enables general configuration of this component. Any object implementing this interface and sent down the configure channel to this component will have its configure method invoked on this component.

For an example, see ActiveApplet.Configure.

Method Summary
 void configure(TextArea textArea)
           
 

Method Detail

configure

void configure(TextArea textArea)
Parameters:
textArea - the TextArea being configured.
